turns.content: I want to make a list (or if there's an existing list I want that) of facial expressions/emotions, so I can classify all the emotions you might see in a photograph of a person.

Here is a list of common facial expressions and emotions that people can display:

1. Happy
2. Sad
3. Angry
4. Surprised
5. Fearful
6. Disgusted
7. Confused
8. Calm
9. Contempt
10. Excited
11. Tired
12. Pensive
13. Joyful
14. Relaxed
15. Bored
16. Amused
17. Anxious
18. Ashamed
19. Interested
20. Pleased

This is not an exhaustive list, and different cultures and individuals may have different ways of expressing emotions. It is also worth noting that people may experience multiple emotions at the same time, making it difficult to classify a single emotion.
is it possible to link those with descriptive words for the physical expressions that go with those emotions?

Yes, it is possible to link facial expressions with descriptive words for the physical expressions that go with certain emotions. Here is a list of common facial expressions and the physical expressions that are associated with them:

1. Happy: Smiling, relaxed eyes, raised cheeks, wrinkles around the eyes (often referred to as "crow's feet")
2. Sad: Furrowed brow, downturned mouth, droopy eyelids, tears
3. Angry: Furrowed brow, scowling, clenched jaw, tight lips, flared nostrils
4. Surprised: Raised eyebrows, widened eyes, open mouth
5. Fearful: Wide eyes, raised eyebrows, open mouth, tense jaw
6. Disgusted: Curled lip, wrinkled nose, raised eyebrows
7. Confused: Furrowed brow, squinted eyes, tilted head
8. Calm: Relaxed face, neutral expression
9. Contempt: One corner of the mouth raised, often accompanied by a raised eyebrow
10. Excited: Wide eyes, raised eyebrows, open mouth, flushed cheeks
11. Tired: Droopy eyelids, wrinkles around the eyes, sagging face
12. Pensive: Furrowed brow, squinted eyes, tilted head, puckered lips
13. Joyful: Smiling, relaxed eyes, raised cheeks, wrinkles around the eyes
14. Relaxed: Soft eyes, slight smile, relaxed jaw
15. Bored: Furrowed brow, squinted eyes, tilted head, puckered lips
16. Amused: Smiling, relaxed eyes, wrinkles around the eyes
17. Anxious: Furrowed brow, tight lips, tense jaw, fidgeting
18. Ashamed: Downcast eyes, furrowed brow, downturned mouth, flushed cheeks
19. Interested: Raised eyebrows, widened eyes, leaned forward
20. Pleased: Smiling, relaxed eyes, wrinkles around the eyes, a slight nod of the head.

It is worth noting that these physical expressions may vary depending on the individual, culture and context of the situation. Additionally, people may not always show clear physical expressions of their emotions and some emotions may have similar physical expressions.
You're welcome! I'm glad I could help. If you have any other questions, feel free to ask.
